00030 function moveLesson($curriculumID,$zeit,$oldTime=0) {
00031   $objResponse = new xajaxResponse();
00032   
00033   $rs = mysql_query("SELECT mod_group_id FROM curriculum WHERE cur_id='".$curriculumID."'");
00034   $mod_group_ID = @mysql_result($rs,0);
00035   $showRoomPlanning = false;
00036   if($mod_group_ID) {
00037     // Modul
00038     $rs = mysql_query("SELECT sub_id FROM subject WHERE mod_id='".$mod_group_ID."'");
00039     $book_ids = array();
00040     while($data = mysql_fetch_assoc($rs)) {
00041       $rs_roomID = mysql_query("SELECT room_id FROM booking WHERE cur_id='".$curriculumID."' AND book_begin='".date('Y-m-d H:i:00',$oldTime)."' AND module_sub_id='".$data['sub_id']."'");
00042       $room = @mysql_result($rs_roomID,0);
00043       if($oldTime && $room) {
00044         mysql_query("UPDATE booking SET room_id='".$room."',book_begin='".date('Y-m-d H:i:00',$zeit)."',book_end='".date('Y-m-d H:i:00',$zeit+90*60)."' WHERE cur_id IN (SELECT cur_id FROM curriculum WHERE mod_group_id='".$mod_group_ID."') AND book_begin='".date('Y-m-d H:i:00',$oldTime)."' AND module_sub_id='".$data['sub_id']."'");
00045         $rs_bookID = mysql_query("SELECT book_id FROM booking WHERE cur_id IN (SELECT cur_id FROM curriculum WHERE mod_group_id='".$mod_group_ID."') AND book_begin='".date('Y-m-d H:i:00',$zeit)."' AND module_sub_id='".$data['sub_id']."'");
00046         while($booking_ids = mysql_fetch_assoc($rs_bookID)) $book_ids[] = $booking_ids['book_id'];
00047       } elseif($oldTime) {
00048         mysql_query("UPDATE booking SET book_begin='".date('Y-m-d H:i:00',$zeit)."',book_end='".date('Y-m-d H:i:00',$zeit+90*60)."' WHERE cur_id IN (SELECT cur_id FROM curriculum WHERE mod_group_id='".$mod_group_ID."') AND book_begin='".date('Y-m-d H:i:00',$oldTime)."' AND module_sub_id='".$data['sub_id']."'");
00049         $rs_bookID = mysql_query("SELECT book_id FROM booking WHERE cur_id IN (SELECT cur_id FROM curriculum WHERE mod_group_id='".$mod_group_ID."') AND book_begin='".date('Y-m-d H:i:00',$zeit)."' AND module_sub_id='".$data['sub_id']."'");
00050         while($booking_ids = mysql_fetch_assoc($rs_bookID)) $book_ids[] = $booking_ids['book_id'];
00051         $showRoomPlanning = true;
00052       } else {
00053         $rs_module = mysql_query("SELECT cur_id FROM curriculum WHERE mod_group_id='".$mod_group_ID."'");
00054         while($module = mysql_fetch_assoc($rs_module)) {
00055           mysql_query("INSERT INTO booking (cur_id,room_id,book_begin,book_end,module_sub_id) VALUES ('".$module['cur_id']."',(SELECT room_id FROM defaultrooms WHERE class_id=(SELECT class_id FROM curriculum WHERE cur_id=(SELECT cur_id FROM curriculum WHERE mod_group_id='".$mod_group_ID."' LIMIT 1)) ORDER BY priority LIMIT 1),'".date('Y-m-d H:i:00',$zeit)."','".date('Y-m-d H:i:00',$zeit+90*60)."','".$data['sub_id']."')");
00056           $book_ids[] = mysql_insert_id();
00057         }
00058         $showRoomPlanning = true;
00059       }
00060     }
00061     if($showRoomPlanning && mysql_num_rows($rs)>1) {
00062       $objResponse->addAlert(utf8_encode(getTranslation(531,$_COOKIE['lang'])));
00063       $objResponse->addScript("openRoomPlanning('roomplanning.php?lang=".$_COOKIE['lang']."&curriculumID=".$curriculumID."&date=".$zeit."')");
00064       return $objResponse;
00065     } else {
00066       $rs = mysql_query("SELECT 1 FROM booking WHERE book_begin='".date('Y-m-d H:i:00',$zeit)."' AND room_id IN (SELECT room_id FROM booking WHERE book_id IN ('".implode("','",$book_ids)."')) AND book_id NOT IN ('".implode("','",$book_ids)."')");
00067       if(mysql_num_rows($rs)>0) {
00068         // Raum bereits belegt zu diesem Termin
00069         $objResponse->addAlert(utf8_encode(getTranslation(532,$_COOKIE['lang'])));
00070       }
00071     }
00072   } else {
00073     $rs = mysql_query("SELECT room_id FROM booking WHERE cur_id='".$curriculumID."' AND book_begin='".date('Y-m-d H:i:00',$oldTime)."'");
00074     $room = @mysql_result($rs,0);
00075     if($oldTime && $room) {
00076       mysql_query("UPDATE booking SET room_id='".$room."',book_begin='".date('Y-m-d H:i:00',$zeit)."',book_end='".date('Y-m-d H:i:00',$zeit+90*60)."' WHERE cur_id='".$curriculumID."' AND book_begin='".date('Y-m-d H:i:00',$oldTime)."'");
00077       $rs = mysql_query("SELECT book_id FROM booking WHERE cur_id='".$curriculumID."' AND book_begin='".date('Y-m-d H:i:00',$zeit)."'");
00078       $book_id = @mysql_result($rs,0);
00079     } elseif($oldTime) {
00080       mysql_query("UPDATE booking SET book_begin='".date('Y-m-d H:i:00',$zeit)."',book_end='".date('Y-m-d H:i:00',$zeit+90*60)."' WHERE cur_id='".$curriculumID."' AND book_begin='".date('Y-m-d H:i:00',$oldTime)."'");
00081       $rs = mysql_query("SELECT book_id FROM booking WHERE cur_id='".$curriculumID."' AND book_begin='".date('Y-m-d H:i:00',$zeit)."'");
00082       $book_id = @mysql_result($rs,0);
00083     } else {
00084       mysql_query("INSERT INTO booking (cur_id,room_id,book_begin,book_end) VALUES ('".$curriculumID."',(SELECT room_id FROM defaultrooms WHERE class_id=(SELECT class_id FROM curriculum WHERE cur_id='".$curriculumID."') ORDER BY priority LIMIT 1),'".date('Y-m-d H:i:00',$zeit)."','".date('Y-m-d H:i:00',$zeit+90*60)."')");
00085       $book_id = mysql_insert_id();
00086     }
00087  
00088  
00089     $rs = mysql_query("SELECT 1 FROM booking WHERE book_begin='".date('Y-m-d H:i:00',$zeit)."' AND room_id=(SELECT room_id FROM booking WHERE book_id='".$book_id."') AND book_id!='".$book_id."'");
00090     if(mysql_num_rows($rs)>0) {
00091       // Raum bereits belegt zu diesem Termin
00092       $objResponse->addAlert(utf8_encode(getTranslation(533,$_COOKIE['lang'])));
00093     }
00094   }
00095   return $objResponse;
00096 }

00108 function deleteBooking($curriculumID,$time) {
00109   $objResponse = new xajaxResponse();
00110   $curriculumID = str_replace("_mod","",$curriculumID);
00111   mysql_query("DELETE FROM booking WHERE cur_id='".$curriculumID."' AND book_begin='".date('Y-m-d H:i:00',$time)."'");
00112   return $objResponse;
00113 }
00114 
00125 function changeRoom($bookID,$room_nr) {
00126   $objResponse = new xajaxResponse();
00127   mysql_query("UPDATE booking SET room_id=(SELECT room_id FROM room WHERE room_nr='".$room_nr."') WHERE book_ID='".$bookID."'");
00128   return $objResponse;
00129 }
